title: Two Top Websites for Quantitative Stock Analysis - Barron's

organizations.name: top websites for quantitative stock analysis - barron's digital investor two top websites for quantitative stock analysis longtime

text:
Digital Investor Two Top Websites for Quantitative Stock Analysis Longtime stock-charting researcher Chaikin Analytics has upgraded its trading package, and offers two picks: Tyson Foods and Entergy. Plus, a new launch, iVIEWMarkets, provides real-time data. By Biography January 30, 2016 
Rules-based investing and trading strategies—both relying on quantitative analysis—continue to gain favor among individual investors, as demonstrated by new quant tools from Chaikin Analytics and iVIEWMarkets. 
Chaikin, which has long used a proprietary 20-factor algorithm to rate the alpha prospects of securities, has added both screening and options-analysis tools to the desktop and smartphone iterations of its site... Get The Full Story
